##MAP

*latest update at 2017-05-23*

*author Able*

**Des**

高德地图的简单封装,目前仅支持点标注和信息窗体

**Require**

React,ReactDOM

**Useage**

```
    import React,{Component} from 'react';
    import * as Map from '../';
    import load_script from '../tools/load_script';
    export default class MapTest extends Component{
        render(){
            let style = {
                width:'800px',
                height:'400px'
            };
            return (
                <div>
                    <h1>test</h1>
                    <div ref="container" style={style}></div>
                </div>
            )
        }
        componentDidMount(){
            const url = 'http://webapi.amap.com/maps?v=1.3&key=57263d2a64c3e10d5fc13819ed372b00';
            let self = this;
            load_script(url,function(){
                let container = self.refs.container;
                let map_config = {
                    resizeEnable: true,
                    zoom: 9,
                    center: [116.480983, 40.0958]
                };
                const map_obj = Map.init(container,map_config);
    
                const markers = [{
                    long:116.480983,
                    lat:40.0958,
                },{
                    long:116.480973,
                    lat:35.1638,
                }];
                const marker_events = [
                    {
                        type:'click',
                        handle:function(){
                            let marker = this;
                            let position = marker.getPosition();
                            let info_config = {
                                content:'<h1>HELLO WORLD</h1>'
                            };
                            // 点击点标记时设置信息窗体
                            Map.open_info_win(info_config,position,map_obj);
                        }
                    }
                ];
    
                // 标注点标记
                Map.set_marker(markers,marker_events,map_obj);
    
                // 清除地图上的覆盖物[点标注|信息窗体]
                setTimeout(function(){
                    Map.clear_map(map_obj);
                },10000);
            });
        }
    }
```
